title: new game mode
body: how about a game mode where each champion start with a randomly selected item worth 2000 or more? this will add an element of luck to the game and make it more fun. if they get an useless item for the champion they can always sell it.

You mean like ARAM?
yeah i thought this also... also it seems totally redundant if they can just sell the item.
